column4: Is there a way to make the automatic fsck every 30some boots happen at shutdown and not bootup?
Because when I'm trying to boot up my laptop to do a powerpoint at school is REALLY not a good time to filesystemcheck a 80GB disk
there is another package that substite th fsck and that do the fsck when you poweeroff your machine
